job.title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer, Data Science
job.description: strongAbout the Role strongActionIQ is looking for an experienced teamoriented Senior Machine Learning Engineer with a strong track record of building machine learning ML platforms or acting as the tech lead for the buildout of an ML platform or ML features You will be the first hire of a team at ActionIQ that will spearhead the next wave of ML technologies As part of that effort you will drive early architecture decisions and the implementation of an ML platform that works with and complements our core data processing platform You will work closely with our data science team to build a system that automates their daytoday workflows and enables new ML explorations You will also collaborate with our Product team to build more intelligence into our productbrbrstrongAbout the Team strongThe Data Science team at ActionIQ is responsible for working closely with customers and translating their user data into actionable business insights As our first Machine Learning Engineer you will work with your counterparts in Data Science as well as other platform teams to build out a machine learning team and platform that can be used to transition models and experiments into reliable productionquality product features and workflowsbrbrstronguResponsibilitiesbrustrongul liAssess the existing platform and datascience architecture at ActionIQ Design and implement a highquality scalable machine learning platform using either custom selfhosted or managed services Ensure that the resulting platform can maintain throughput and latency requirements given magnitude changes in customer datali liOverhaul our current data science development workflows and toolingli liSet best practices for the continued evolution and support of both the machine learning platform as well as data science development toolingli liParticipate in the oncall rotation to support our production systems Take learnings from any incidents to help rearchitect or update systems processes or configs to avoid them entirelyli brbrulstronguRequirementsbrustrongul li5 years supporting data science or machine learning platforms including developing and maintaining production level code with experience both as an implementer and tech leadli liStrong understanding of datascience algorithms with the ability to implementenhance a range of model forms GBM KNN etc and feature transformationsli liStrong interest in and history of building reliable wellarchitected production codeli liStrong track record of working with datascience platforms and libraries such as Spark scikitlearn etc with proficiency in Python and Scala in production settingsli liExcellent communication and collaboration skillsli liEnthusiasm and a growthoriented mindset  as well as the desire to work in a small motivated team to build performant reliable machine learning at scaleli liInterest in working with JVMbased bigdata technologies including Spark Kafka etcli brulemOur work is broad and complex in nature  please dont rule yourself out if you do not meet every requirement brbremustrongBenefitsbrstronguul liWork with a fun inclusive and smart team of people as we build a NYCbased enterprise software companyli liCompetitive compensation package including significant equity componentli liBacked by toptier VCs Sequoia Andreessen Horowitz FirstMark Capitalli liTop notch health insurance
